title: Palace of the Three Crosses
description: Brandan and Joachim have returned from the brink of Hell, but everyone questions if they are truly healed and one with Asha.As each prince tries to readjust to life, they must face the funeral of their father and their missing mother.They each take on the responsibility of ruling a country with new wives by their sides, but can they and the countries survive the trials that will ensue because of their choices?
author: Christina Weigand
